title: Momentum $$1$$ Hint $$1$$
text: Consider the formula for momentum: $$momentum=mass velocity$$.

title: Momentum $$1$$
text: Compare the ratio of elephant’s momentum with the momentum of a $$0.0400-kg$$ tranquilizer dart fired at a speed of $$600$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$.

title: Momentum $$1$$ Hint $$2$$
text: Momentum is conserved. Think about the relationship between mass and velocity.
